== Notes for a Main Release ==

Create and copy in the existing content in to the new pages.
Confirm that the pages are created and & working both in help.ubuntu.com/*** and wiki.ubuntu.com/***

== Developer Tasks ==
=== Branch packages repo ===
Branch packages repo for the new version :
* https://code.launchpad.net/~lubuntu-desktop/+junk/lubuntu-meta
* https://code.launchpad.net/~lubuntu-desktop/+junk/lubuntu-default-settings
* https://code.launchpad.net/~lubuntu-art/+junk/lubuntu-artwork
Exemple, for maverick -> natty for lubuntu-meta :
* bzr branch lp:~lubuntu-desktop/+junk/lubuntu-meta
* bzr push lp:~lubuntu-desktop/+junk/lubuntu-meta-maverick

=== Update Developers pages ===
* Migrate Schedule and Tasks of <nowiki>[[Lubuntu-Developers]]</nowiki> to <nowiki>[[Lubuntu-Developers-OldTasksAndSchedules]]</nowiki>

=== Backports ===
* Backport new LXDE packages from the new shiny release to the old releases, in https://launchpad.net/~lxde/+archive/ppa
